mapper.select: SELECT sb.sbag_no AS sbagNo, sb.mb_id AS mbId, sb.pd_num AS pdNum, sb.sbag_amount AS sbagAmount, sb.sbag_price AS sbagPrice, p.pd_chng_fname AS pdChngFname, p.pd_name AS pdName, p.pd_price AS pdPrice FROM shopbag sb JOIN product p ON sb.pd_num = p.pd_num WHERE sb.mb_id = #{mbId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopbag (sbag_no, mb_id, pd_num, sbag_amount, sbag_price) VALUES (sbag_no_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mbId}, #{pdNum}, #{sbagAmount}, #{sbagPrice})
